org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.name: Patient Ever Enrolled
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.sqlQuery:
SELECT p.`patient_id` as patientId, pn.`family_name` AS surname, pn.`given_name` AS firstname, person.gender AS `Sex`, DATE_FORMAT(person.birthdate,'%d/%m/%Y') AS `dob`, IF(TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,CURDATE())>=5,TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,CURDATE()),NULL) AS `currentAge`, IF(TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,CURDATE())<5,TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,person.birthdate,CURDATE()),NULL) AS `currentAgeMonths`,
MIN(DATE_FORMAT(art_date.value_datetime,'%d-%b-%Y')) AS `artStartDate`, CONCAT("+234-",psn_atr.value) AS registrationPhoneNo, IF(biometrictable.patient_Id IS NOT NULL,'Yes','No') AS biometricCaptured, IF(biometrictable.patient_Id IS NOT NULL,IF(invalidprint.patient_Id IS NOT NULL,'No','Yes'),"") AS validCapture,
MAX(IF(pidentifier.identifier_type=3, pidentifier.identifier,'')) eid, MAX(IF(pidentifier.identifier_type=4, pidentifier.identifier,'')) pepid, MAX(IF(pidentifier.identifier_type=5, pidentifier.identifier,'')) hospitalNo, MAX(IF(pidentifier.identifier_type=6, pidentifier.identifier,'')) ancNo, MAX(IF(pidentifier.identifier_type=7, pidentifier.identifier,'')) exposedInfantId, MAX(IF(pidentifier.identifier_type=8, pidentifier.identifier,'')) hts, MAX(IF(pidentifier.identifier_type=9, pidentifier.identifier,'')) pep, MAX(IF(pidentifier.identifier_type=10, pidentifier.identifier,'')) recencyID FROM `patient` p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT patient_identifier.`patient_id`, patient_identifier.`identifier`, `identifier_type` FROM `patient_identifier`
) AS pidentifier ON (pidentifier.patient_id = p.`patient_id`) LEFT JOIN `person_name` pn ON(pn.`person_id`=p.patient_id AND p.voided=0 AND pn.`preferred`=1) INNER JOIN person ON(person.person_id=p.patient_id) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT person_id AS person_id, MIN(value_datetime) AS value_datetime FROM obs WHERE obs.concept_id=159599 AND obs.`voided` = 0 GROUP BY person_id ) AS art_date ON (art_date.person_id = p.`patient_id`) LEFT JOIN `person_attribute` psn_atr ON(psn_atr.`person_id`=p.patient_id AND p.voided=0 AND psn_atr.`person_attribute_type_id`=8)
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT biometricinfo.patient_Id FROM biometricinfo ) AS biometrictable ON(p.patient_id=biometrictable.patient_Id AND p.voided=0) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT biometricinfo.patient_Id FROM biometricinfo WHERE template NOT LIKE 'Rk1S%' OR CONVERT(new_template USING utf8) NOT LIKE 'Rk1S%' ) AS invalidprint ON(p.patient_id=invalidprint.patient_Id AND p.voided=0) LEFT JOIN global_property ON(global_property.property='facility_datim_code') GROUP BY p.`patient_id`
